title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
description:
WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie. Slate movie critic Dana Stevens, staff writer Julia Turner, and NPR's Mike Pesca discuss the romantic comedy My Super Ex-Girlfriend, starring Uma Thurman and Luke Wilson.
        

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
